title: $:/xp/mcp
name: MCP
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL":{"title":"$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL","caption":"TiddlyWiki CPL","list-after":"$:/config/OfficialPluginLibrary","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","url":"https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TiddlyWiki-CPL","text":"<% if [[$:/language]get[text]!prefix[$:/languages/zh]] %> @@color:red;''Please backup your wiki before installing the plugin, the plugin source cannot be held responsible for any personal losses caused by the plugin!''@@ <% else %> @@color:red;''请在安装插件之前备份您的 Wiki，此插件源无法为插件造成的个人损失负责！''@@ <% endif %> <$macrocall $name="tabs" state="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/panel-tab-state" tabsList="plugin-database uninstall-manager settings +[addprefix[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/]]" default="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-database" />"},"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins","subtitle":"{{$:/core/images/download-button}} {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Add/Caption}}","text":"\define install-plugin-actions() \whitespace trim <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-load-plugin-from-library" url={{!!url}} title={{$(assetInfo)$!!original-title}}/> <$set name="url" value={{!!url}}> <$set name="currentTiddler" value=<>> <$list filter="[enlist{!!dependents}] [{!!parent-plugin}] +[sort[name]]" variable="dependency"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-load-plugin-from-library" url=<> title=<>/> \end \define install-plugin-button() \whitespace trim
<$set name="libraryVersion" value={{{ [get[version]] }}}> <$set name="installedVersion" value={{{ [get[original-title]get[version]] }}}> <$set name="reinstall-type" value={{{ [compare:version:eqthen[tc-reinstall]] [compare:version:gtthen[tc-reinstall-upgrade]] [compare:version:ltthen[tc-reinstall-downgrade]] }}}> <$button actions=<> class={{{ [get[original-title]has[version]then] tc-btn-invisible tc-install-plugin +[join[ ]] }}}> {{$:/core/images/download-button}} <$list filter="[get[original-title]get[version]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Install/Caption}}"> <$list filter="[compare:version:gt]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage=" \whitespace trim <$list filter='[compare:version:lt]' variable='ignore' emptyMessage='{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Reinstall/Caption}}'> {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Downgrade/Caption}} "> {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Update/Caption}}
<$reveal stateTitle=<> stateField="requires-reload" type="match" text="yes">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/PluginWillRequireReload}}
\end \define popup-state-macro() $:/state/add-plugin-info/$(connectionTiddler)$/$(assetInfo)$ \end \define display-plugin-info(type) \whitespace trim <$set name="popup-state" value=<>>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<> setTo="yes"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<> setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}
<$list filter="[has[icon]]" emptyMessage="""<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/plugin-generic-$type$"/>""">

<$text text={{{ [get[name]] ~[get[original-title]split[/]last[1]] }}}/>: <$view tiddler=<> field="description"/>

<$view tiddler=<> field="original-title"/>

<$view tiddler=<> field="version"/>
<$list filter="[get[original-title]get[version]]" variable="installedVersion">
{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/AlreadyInstalled/Hint}}
<>
<$set name="original-title" value={{{ [get[original-title]] }}}> <$reveal type="match" text="yes" state=<>>
<$list filter="[enlist{!!dependents}] [get[parent-plugin]] +[limit[1]] ~[get[original-title]!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore">
<$list filter="[get[original-title]!is[tiddler]]"> {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/NotInstalled/Hint}} <$set name="currentTiddler" value=<>> <$list filter="[enlist{!!dependents}] [get[parent-plugin]] +[limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/AlsoRequires}} <$list filter="[enlist{!!dependents}] [{!!parent-plugin}] +[sort[name]]" variable="dependency"> <$text text=<>/>
<$transclude tiddler=<> field="readme" mode="block"/>
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/RemoteAssetInfo]server-url{!!url}original-plugin-type[$type$]has[parent-plugin]parent-pluginlimit[1]]" variable="ignore">
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/RemoteAssetInfo]server-url{!!url}original-plugin-type[$type$]has[parent-plugin]parent-pluginsort[name]]" variable="assetInfo"> <>
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/RemoteAssetInfo]server-url{!!url}original-plugin-type[$type$]has[parent-plugin]parent-pluginlimit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$reveal type="nomatch" text="yes" state=<> tag="div" class="tc-plugin-info-sub-plugin-indicator"> <$wikify name="count" text="""<$count filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/RemoteAssetInfo]server-url{!!url}original-plugin-type[$type$]has[parent-plugin]parent-plugin]"/>"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set=<> setTo="yes"> {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/SubPluginPrompt}} \end \define load-plugin-library-button() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[get[enabled]else[yes]match[yes]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="tc-btn-big-green"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-load-plugin-library" url={{!!url}} infoTitlePrefix="$:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/"/> {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/OpenPluginLibrary}} \end \define display-server-assets(type) \whitespace trim {{$:/language/Search/Search}}: <$edit-text tiddler="""$:/temp/RemoteAssetSearch/$(currentTiddler)$""" default="" type="search" tag="input"/> <$reveal state="""$:/temp/RemoteAssetSearch/$(currentTiddler)$""" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="""$:/temp/RemoteAssetSearch/$(currentTiddler)$""" $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/RemoteAssetInfo]server-url{!!url}original-plugin-type[$type$]search:author,description,original-title,readme,title{$:/temp/RemoteAssetSearch/$(currentTiddler)$}sort[name]]" variable="assetInfo"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/RemoteAssetSearch/$(currentTiddler)$]has[text]] ~[!has[parent-plugin]]" variable="ignore"> <>
\end \define display-server-connection() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/ServerConnection]suffix{!!url}]" variable="connectionTiddler" emptyMessage=<>> <$set name="transclusion" value=<>> <> \end \define close-library-button() \whitespace trim <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/temp/ServerConnection/$(PluginLibraryURL)$' text=''> <$button class='tc-btn-big-green'> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-unload-plugin-library" url={{!!url}}/> {{$:/core/images/chevron-left}} {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/ClosePluginLibrary}} <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/temp/ServerConnection/$(PluginLibraryURL)$]][prefix[$:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/$(PluginLibraryURL)$]]"/> \end \define plugin-library-listing() \whitespace trim
<$set name="defaultTab" value={{{ [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/PluginLibrary]] }}}>
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/PluginLibrary]]"> <$button set=<> setTo=<> default=<> selectedClass="tc-tab-selected"> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude field="caption"/>
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/PluginLibrary]] -[[$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL]]"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<> default=<>>

<$link><$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>

//<$view field="url"/>// <$transclude mode="block"/> <$set name=PluginLibraryURL value={{!!url}}> <> <> <$list filter="[[$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL]]"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<> default=<>>

<$link><$text text="TiddlyWiki Community Plugin Library"/>

//<$view field="url"/>// <$transclude mode="block"/>
\end \import [subfilter{$:/core/config/GlobalImportFilter}] \whitespace trim
<>

<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[出现了一些问题]else[Some errors occured]] }}}/>: <$text text={{!!text}}/> <$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[请尝试刷新]else[Please try refreshing]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index]is[tiddler]field:text[yes]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[加载中...]else[Loading...]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index]is[tiddler]]" variable="ready"> <$macrocall $name="tabs" state="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugin-database-tab-state" tabsList="home-gallery category-gallery tags-gallery update-manager +[addprefix[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/]]" default="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/home-gallery" /> "},"$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/crypt-button":{"title":"$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/crypt-button","caption":"{{$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/unlocked}} encrypt tiddler","creator":"Danielo","description":"Encrypt individual tiddlers","text":"\whitespace trim <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/openPopup"/> <$encryptTiddler passwordTiddler1="$:/temp/password1" passwordTiddler2="$:/temp/password2"> <$reveal state="$:/state/encrypt" type="match" text={{!!title}} animate="yes">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/password1" tag="input" type="password" default="" placeholder="password" class="tc-edit-texteditor"/>
<$list filter="[all[current]!has[encrypted]]">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/password2" tag="input" type="password" default="" placeholder="repeat" class="tc-edit-texteditor"/>
<$list filter="[all[current]!has[encrypted]]"> <$button message="tw-encrypt-tiddler" set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo="" >Encrypt <$list filter="[is[current]has[encrypted]]"> <$button message="tw-decrypt-tiddler" set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo="" >Decrypt
"},"$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/openPopup":{"title":"$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/openPopup","text":"<$reveal state="$:/state/encrypt" type="nomatch" text={{!!title}} animate="no"><$button set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/unlocked}} <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> <$text text="encrypt tiddler"/> <$reveal state="$:/state/encrypt" type="match" text={{!!title}} animate="no"><$button set="$:/state/encrypt" setTo="" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/unlocked}} <$list checked-frozen() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab"tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove"tags=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856"text="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab"/> \end \define unchecked-frozen() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab"tags="$:/tags/SideBar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove"tags="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856"text="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/active-tab"/> \end These settings let you customize the behaviour of the Favorites plugin. --- ;Show Favorites setting in more sidebar :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar ;Options :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/favorites/NewFolderPosition" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Add new folder at the top of folders list :<$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/favorites/FolderOpenOnDrop" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> Open folder on drop item : Viewtoolbar icon color <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/IconColor" field="text" tag="input" type="color" class="kk-fv-color-input"/> <$list filter="[[$:/config/favorites/IconColor]get[text]!match[#ff0000]]" variable=null> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible kk-fav-btn" tooltip="Reset viewtoolbar icon color">{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/favorites/IconColor" text="#ff0000" /> ;Freeze favorites :<$checkbox checkactions=<> tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/sidebar/frozen-tab" tag="$:/tags/SideBar" checkactions=<> uncheckactions=<> > Enable frozen tab ;Shortcuts : <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/expand-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like ctrl" class="kk-fav-input"/> + click : <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + click : <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/open-folder-items" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + click : <$edit-text tiddler="$:/config/favorites/modifierkey/sidebar-tab-from-folder" tag=input default="" placeholder="a moifier key like shift" class="kk-fav-input"/> + click ;Hidden settings : [[Global setting for item link title|$:/config/favorites/ItemLinkTitle]]"},"$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/ui/buttons/add-remove","caption":"{{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/heart}} filter='[match[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/kookma/favorites/images/heart}}<$list filter='[match[yes]]'><$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}/> \define btn-add-to-favorites() <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Add}}aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Add}}class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler=<>$subfilter=<>$field=list/> <$macrocall tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Hint/Remove}}aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Favorites/Caption/Remove}}class=<>> <$action-listops button|$:/plugins/tg/prettylink-button]] * [[Preview|$:/plugins/tobibeer/preview]] * [[Refnotes|$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes]] * [[Shiraz|$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz]] * [[Tiddler Commander|$:/plugins/kookma/commander]] * [[TiddlyMap|$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap]] * [[Trashbin|$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin]] * [[Utility|$:/plugins/kookma/utility]] > Caution: Make sure the tiddlers are deactivated, when disabling or removing plugins."},"$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/bibtexlibrary":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/ui/bibtexlibrary","caption":"Bibliography","text":"\import [[$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/macros/search-ui]] \define dispEntry() <$link/> <$macrocall $name=stretchText text=""" <$view field="bibtex-author"/>. (<$view field="bibtex-year"/>). <$view field="bibtex-title"/>.""" /> \end \define searchFilter() [has[bibtex-title]search:$(sField)$[$(sTerm)$]] \define bibLibrary() \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/refnotes/macros/stretch-text]] <$vars sField={{{[get[field]] ~[[bibtex-author]]}}} sTerm={{{[get[text]]}}}>
Show and Hide Details:   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="show item details">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=show /> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="hide item details">{{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} <$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> />

\end

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restore \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confirm-empty \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-operation \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/preview-option \define show-link() \whitespace trim <$link to=<> ><$text text={{{ [removeprefix[$:/trashbin/]] }}} /> <$reveal state="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date" type="match" text="show">  <$view field="modified" format="date" template="0MM/0DD/YYYY 0hh:0mm AM"/> \end \define date-button() <$list filter="[[$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date]!is[tiddler]]"> <$button set="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date" setTo="show" tooltip="Show date" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/xp/images/time}} <$list filter="[[$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date]is[tiddler]]"> <$button tooltip="Hide date" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="$:/xp/trashbin/delete-date"/> {{$:/xp/images/remove}} \end \define recycle-button() {{||$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-button}} \end \define delete-button() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Delete permanently"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/times.svg}} <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title>]" variable=ignore> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define trashbin-siderbar-ui() <$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]limit[1]]' variable=null emptyMessage="Trashbin is empty">
<> <> <> <> <>    <$count filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]]'/> items <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]$(sortType)$]">
<>
<>
<>
\end <$vars sortType={{{[get[text]] ~[[]] }}}> <> aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} class=<> > <> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="show" default="hide" tag=span> <$button set=<> setTo="hide" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Utility/Caption}} class="""$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ tc-selected""" > <> \end \define disp-on-pagecontrols() \whitespace
